title: "MeLMSens pilot data analysis"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
results_all = read_csv('../data/processed/results_all.csv')
results_all = results_all %>%
  separate(condition,into=c("axis","adaptation"),sep="_") %>%
  mutate(adaptation=factor(.$adaptation,levels=c('low','high'))) %>%
  mutate(contrast_LMS=contrast_L)
```
```{r}

```
```{r}
results_all %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = adaptation, y = contrast_LMS, fill = axis) +
  geom_violin(scale="area", position = "dodge")
```
